remarks: A bijection from the numbers less than ` N / A ` to the multiples of ` A ` less than ` N ` .  Useful for some sum manipulations. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-May-2016.)
statement:
dvdsflf1o.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
dvdsflf1o.2 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
dvdsflf1o.f $e |- F = ( n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` ( A / N ) ) ) |-> ( N x. n ) ) $.
dvdsflf1o $p |- ( ph -> F : ( 1 ... ( |_ ` ( A / N ) ) ) -1-1-onto-> { x e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` A ) ) | N || x } ) $.
$d A n x $.
$d N n x $.
$d n ph $.
